issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Alloy

components.name: Appcelerator Modules
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Modules here.

fields.description:
I am using AGCalendar module for Calendar view. But this Calendar view looks as per iOS 6 Calendar.
I am using this module
https://github.com/Appgutta/AGCalendar

But i want to show iOS 7 Calendar view. So please guide me how am i get iOS 7 Calendar view for iPhone?
fields.summary: Calendar View as per iOS 7 Calendar

comments.body:
It appears that AGCalendar owner has started fixing iOS7 issues so I would suggest you to follow up with him directly. Note that AGCalendar is a 3rd party module that is not part of the Titanium SDK.

It is worth mentioning that our Q&A forum is a more appropriate place for this type of questions.
http://developer.appcelerator.com/questions/newest

Can you please guide me how may i create iOS 7 Calendar view?
I just use this module for reference. Its better to use your native features of Titanium. Because i don't want to depended on external module.

Thanks,
Karan
I would suggest you to try Titanium Calendar API - http://docs.appcelerator.com/titanium/latest/#!/api/Titanium.Calendar

But my question is
How may i get Calendar View in Titanium.Calendar.
I want to show Calendar view as per iOS 7 Calendar view. I tried Titanium.Calendar but not getting Calendar View. Just showing events, add events.

Thanks,
Karan
Please post this question to Q&A forum as that would be a more appropriate place for such queries.

I will do that and if you have any solution then please send me.

Thanks for your quick response.

Thanks,
Karan
